name: fast-animation-tool
description: The fast animation tool with zero dependencies.
author: Thomas Wilkerling

scripts.build: node compile RELEASE=min DEBUG=false SUPPORT_COLOR=true SUPPORT_CONTROL=true SUPPORT_SEQUENCES=true SUPPORT_ENGINE='all' SUPPORT_TRANSFORM=true SUPPORT_FILTER=true SUPPORT_SHADOW=true SUPPORT_EASING=true
scripts.build-light: node compile RELEASE=light DEBUG=false SUPPORT_COLOR=false SUPPORT_CONTROL=false SUPPORT_SEQUENCES=false SUPPORT_ENGINE='js' SUPPORT_TRANSFORM=false SUPPORT_FILTER=false SUPPORT_SHADOW=false SUPPORT_EASING=false
scripts.build-compact: node compile RELEASE=compact DEBUG=false SUPPORT_COLOR=true SUPPORT_CONTROL=false SUPPORT_SEQUENCES=false SUPPORT_ENGINE='js' SUPPORT_TRANSFORM=true SUPPORT_FILTER=false SUPPORT_SHADOW=false SUPPORT_EASING=true
scripts.build-custom: node compile RELEASE=custom DEBUG=false SUPPORT_COLOR=false SUPPORT_CONTROL=false SUPPORT_SEQUENCES=false SUPPORT_ENGINE='none' SUPPORT_TRANSFORM=false SUPPORT_FILTER=false SUPPORT_SHADOW=false SUPPORT_EASING=false
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-light && npm run build-compact
